tree.description: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a $h% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 1).  Only useable outdoors.  $n charge.  Lasts $d.

tree.name: Improved Nature's Grasp
tree.description: Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by $s1%.

tree.name: Improved Entangling Roots
tree.description: Gives you a $s1% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots.

tree.name: Improved Moonfire
tree.description: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by $s1%.

tree.name: Natural Weapons
tree.description: Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by $s1%. Also increases chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by $s2%.

tree.name: Natural Shapeshifter
tree.description: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by $s1%.

tree.name: Improved Thorns
tree.description: Increases damage caused by your Thorns spell by $s1%.

tree.name: Omen of Clarity
tree.description: Imbues the Druid with natural energy.  Each of the Druid's melee attacks or offensive spell casts has a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage or healing spell or offensive ability by $16870s1%.  Lasts $d.

tree.name: Nature's Reach
tree.description: Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, Insect Swarm and Hurricane spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Vengeance
tree.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Improved Starfire
tree.description: Reduces the cast time of Starfire by $/1000;S2 sec and has a $h% chance to stun the target for $16922d.

tree.name: Nature's Grace
tree.description: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time and global cooldown of your next spell by $/1000;16886S1 sec.

tree.name: Moonglow
tree.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Moonfury
tree.description: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Moonkin Form
tree.description:
Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form.  While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by $24905s1%, the Mana cost of your Balance spells by $24905s3%, and all party members within $24907a1 yards have their spell critical chance increased by $24907s1%.  The Moonkin can only cast Balance spells, Innervate, and Remove Curse while shapeshifted.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

tree.name: Ferocity
tree.description: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by $/10;s1 Rage or Energy.

tree.name: Feral Aggression
tree.description: Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by $s1% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by $s2%.

tree.name: Feral Instinct
tree.description: Increases threat caused in Bear and Dire Bear Form by $s2% and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.

tree.name: Brutal Impact
tree.description: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by $/1000;S1 sec.

tree.name: Thick Hide
tree.description: Increases your Armor contribution from items by $s1%.

tree.name: Feline Swiftness
tree.description: Increases your movement speed by $s1% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form by $24867s1%.

tree.name: Feral Charge
tree.description: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for $19675d.

tree.name: Sharpened Claws
tree.description: Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by $s1%.

tree.name: Improved Shred
tree.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Shred ability by $s1.

tree.name: Predatory Strikes
tree.description: Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear and Dire Bear Forms by $s1% of your level.

tree.name: Blood Frenzy
tree.description: Increases the duration of Tiger's Fury by 3 seconds and your Enrage now also instantly generates 5 rage. In addition, Tiger's Fury and Enrage increase your attack speed by 6% for 6 seconds.

tree.name: Primal Fury
tree.description: Gives you a $h% chance to gain an additional $/10;16959s1 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form and your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a chance to add an additional combo point.

tree.name: Savage Fury
tree.description: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by $s1%.

tree.name: Berserk
tree.description: Removes all Fear effects and increases your energy regeneration rate by 100% while in Cat form, and increases your total health by 20% while in Bear form. After the effect ends, the health is lost. Effect lasts 20 seconds.

tree.name: Heart of the Wild
tree.description: Increases your Intellect by $s1%.  In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by $s1% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by $s1%.

tree.name: Leader of the Pack
tree.description: While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party members within $24932a1 yards by $24932s1%.

tree.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
tree.description: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Furor
tree.description: Gives you $s1% chance to gain $/10;17057s1 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or $17099s1 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

tree.name: Improved Healing Touch
tree.description: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by $/1000;S1 sec.

tree.name: Nature's Focus
tree.description: Gives you a $s1% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting the Healing Touch, Regrowth, Tranquility, and Wrath spells.

tree.name: Subtlety
tree.description: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Reflection
tree.description: Allows $s1% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

tree.name: Swiftmend
tree.description: Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.

tree.name: Improved Rejuvenation
tree.description: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by $s1%.

tree.name: Tranquil Spirit
tree.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Nature's Swiftness
tree.description: When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast spell.

tree.name: Gift of Nature
tree.description: Increases the effect of all healing spells by $s1%.

tree.name: Improved Tranquility
tree.description: Reduces threat caused by Tranquility by $s1%.

tree.name: Improved Regrowth
tree.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by $s1%.

tree.name: Tree of Life Form
tree.description:
Shapeshift into the Tree of Life.  While in this form you increase healing received by $45706s1% of your total Spirit for all party members within 30 yards, your movement speed is reduced by $45706s2%, and you cannot cast damaging spells or Healing Touch, but the mana cost heal over time spells is reduced by 20%.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.
